statements: SELECT * FROM student_registration;
SELECT student_id, course_id, registration_date FROM student_registration WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM student_registration WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_id, registration_date, student_id FROM student_registration ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(course_id) as avg_course_id FROM student_registration GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM student_registration WHERE student_id = 100 ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM student_registration WHERE course_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY course_id ASC, registration_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, MAX(registration_date) AS latest_registration FROM student_registration GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_id) AS total_students, COUNT(DISTINCT course_id) AS total_courses FROM student_registration;
SELECT * FROM student_registration WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_registration;
SELECT student_name, registration_date FROM student_registration ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, registration_date FROM student_registration WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, course_id, enrollment_date FROM student_registration JOIN course_enrollment ON student_registration.student_id = course_enrollment.student_id;
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_registration WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM student_registration WHERE student_name = 'Alice'
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM student_registration WHERE registration_date <= '2021-12-31'
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM course_enrollment WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date FROM student_registration INNER JOIN course_enrollment ON student_registration.student_id = course_enrollment.student_id WHERE course_id = 101
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM student_registration
SELECT * FROM Student_Registration;
SELECT student_id, student_name, email FROM Student_Registration;
SELECT student_id, student_name, email FROM Student_Registration WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, registration_date FROM Student_Registration ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Course_Enrollment WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT student_name, email FROM Student_Registration WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Student_Registration WHERE registration_date >= '2021-01-01';

SELECT student_name, grade FROM Student_Registration JOIN Course_Enrollment ON Student_Registration.student_id = Course_Enrollment.student_id JOIN Grades ON Course_Enrollment.enrollment_id = Grades.enrollment_id WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT course_id, COUNT(*) AS enrollment_count FROM Course_Enrollment GROUP BY course_id;

SELECT student_name, AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM Student_Registration JOIN Course_Enrollment ON Student_Registration.student_id = Course_Enrollment.student_id JOIN Grades ON Course_Enrollment.enrollment_id = Grades.enrollment_id GROUP BY Student_Registration.student_id HAVING average_grade > 70;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor, credit_hours FROM courses WHERE start_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY credit_hours DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM grades WHERE grade = 'A' ORDER BY student_id ASC, course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE first_name = 'Alice';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT course_name, instructor, credit_hours FROM courses WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT students.first_name, grades.grade FROM students JOIN grades ON students.student_id = grades.student_id;

SELECT students.first_name AS student_name, courses.course_name AS course_name FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN courses ON enrollments.course_id = courses.course_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 2;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id FROM enrollments WHERE enroll_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade FROM grades;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id > 5;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT student_id, course_name, enroll_date FROM enrollments WHERE enroll_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT instructor_name, course_name FROM instructors JOIN courses ON instructors.instructor_id = courses.course_id;
